title: ADHD-Coach.ai
description:
ADHD-Coach.ai is like ChatGPT but specifically designed for individuals with ADHD. 

This AI-powered tool helps you organize your day, stay focused, and boost productivity. 

Whether it's managing to-do lists, setting reminders, or providing real-time, personalized guidance, ADHD-Coach.ai is tailored to your unique needs. 

Our goal is to give you the structure and support you need to thrive, both personally and professionally.
